question: If women is in idat and some one from her relative dies abroad, can she travel and go there during her idat.
answer:
QUESTION
If women is in idat and some one from her relative dies abroad, can she travel and go there during her idat.It is important to go becoz they are alone there in other country can she visit or not and other question is that whether she can go outside if she has any important work what time she should go out side evening aur night.Pls guide
ANSWER


Share:
It is not permissible for a woman in Iddat to attend a funeral locally and abroad.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
